channel.title: Cleaning Up on CI/CD using AWS CDK Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Cleaning Up on CI/CD using AWS CDK Workshop

item.title: 1. Cleaning Provisioned Resources
item.description: In this part you will remove all resources that provisioned by AWS CDK. STEP 1 In the terminal execute the command below. This will remove the stack that you created previously. cdk destroy STEP 2 Execute Click the orange arrow on the right hand side to continue.

item.title: 2. Deleting Cloud9 Environment
item.description: In this part you will delete the AWS Cloud9 environment you created. STEP 1 Open the Cloud9 console. STEP 2 Choose the Cloud9 IDE that you created.
